title: Looks like Trajan font" but is not. What font is this?
content:
When i saw this image first time i though its trajan font but its not trajan. can anyone tell me what font is this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ASQHA_6641.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ASQHA_B_3885.jpg)

P.S. I think i have made right title this time :)
author: artslons

comments.content:
I am not able to open above link. geting below error

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3940.jpg)

Congratulations artslons. You are getting warmer with the titles.

The link from jan is here:

[www.typography.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181849/http:/www.typography.com/ "www.typography.com")
Which one? Mine? Works fine for me. Maybe your version of IE is too old?

both links work fine.  
ie is not the best browser though, and can really mess things up.  
i suggest you download firefox, it's a much better alternative and it's free.  
 [http://www.mozilla.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217181849/http:/www.mozilla.com/ "http://www.mozilla.com/")
Thank you all...........my problem got solved :)
